on vitamins and minerals: I would belly up on a diet of fatty fish, lean meats, and nuts to get essential vitamins and minerals.
Eat your greens: I would focus on leafy green vegetables like spinach, kale, and broccoli, which are packed with vitamins and minerals.
Fortify your meals: I would add vitamin and mineral supplements to my meals to ensure I am getting enough of these important nutrients.
Become: I would seek out vitamin and mineral-rich fruits and vegetables that are readily available in my local grocery store, such as oranges, bananas, and blueberries.
Vegetable broth: I would make my own vegetable broth by boiling a variety of vegetables, such as carrots, celery, and onions, to extract their vitamins and minerals.
